name: Churchill
additionalNotes:
Cigars Rolled by Cubans:

These cigars are blended of the highest grade Connecticut wrapper, which is silky smooth with a dry finish. Hand rolled by Miami's finest Cuban rollers right in the heart of Little Havana. CVMCigars is the exclusive distributor of this cigar and is proud to call it one of our favorites. If you like Davidoff White Label, Ashton Vintage, Macanudo Gold Label, Dunhill we have found you a cigar that is as good if not better, but at a much lower price........
